overview: A friend of her father's sexually molests baby Jeeta's mother. Her father finds out, takes his gun to kill the molester, but ends up killing someone else. On the run, he abandons his daughter, is subsequently arrested and sentenced to prison for 35 years. Jeeta grows up with her foster parents and gets married to Mahendar, whose widowed aunt refuses to accept her. She gives birth to a son, Teji. More problems will surface for Jeeta at the hands of Mahender's aunt.
title: Bhabo
